__e: "Nor would I ask of any fellow American in defense of his freedom that which I would not gladly give myself.
I won't ask who did it, because...
I wouldn't be asking you to postpone the benefit... unless I thought there was something really wrong with Joe.
I'll never want another thing as long as I live. I just want my mother.
- This is the last favor I'll ever ask of you.
I'm not proud of the way I've lived my life.
When I ask you again how much it was, you tell me it´s $19.
To prove it I will let a doctor to check it out tomorrow
I will ask God today why He did not give me some more sons to be sacrificed for the village.
I will never ask you again.
I swear I won't ask you for anything again in this lifetime or any other.
Make me happy, just for one time.
You surely have something to tell you... But I ask you to remain silent.
I'm asking you now : do not take personnally what I'm going to say.
If you can't do that, I'll ask you to leave.
Now, if I think you're good enough, a very big if, but if you are, I will arrange for Professor DeWitt to see you perform.
If I'm not assigned, I go to the driver... and tell him I need the extra hours.
If it'll make you any happier, I'll have the New York office... radio us anything they can find out about her.
